typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		guid as string,
		texte as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT guid, texte FROM adf.Source',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		guid as string,
		texte as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		guid,
		texte
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
